ground_truth: In the transition between figures, each endpoint splits into two new segments, creating two new endpoints, so the number of endpoints doubles.  Figure 1 has $3$ endpoints, so Figure $n$ has $3*2^{n-1}$ endpoints.  Thus Figure 5 has $\boxed{48}$ endpoints.
